Description.0: Group Project: Student groups will assess carbon sequestration measures to achieve national GHG goals for Ireland or another country.
Description.1: Seminar: Students will present their project (natural carbon sequestration measure/stationary source of carbon dioxide emission) and a short viability analysis to the class group.
Description.2: Project: Students will select and profile a natural carbon sequestration measure (carbon capture) or a stationary source of atmospheric carbon dioxide emissions (carbon loss) for Ireland or another country.
